vague_description: Determining vehicle allocation for optimal voter transportation.
detailed_description: A volunteer organization transports voters to the polls on Election Day either by vans or cars. They have vans which can carry \param{VanCapacity} people and cars which can carry \param{CarCapacity} people. They need to transport at least \param{MinimumVoters} voters to the polls. In addition, at most \param{MaxVansRatio} of the vehicles can be vans. How many of each vehicle should be used to minimize the total number of cars used?
target_objective: Minimize the total number of cars used
target_constraints: At least MinimumVoters voters must be transported to the polls
At most MaxVansRatio of the total number of vehicles can be vans
target_parameters: Number of people a van can carry
Number of people a car can carry
Minimum number of voters to transport to the polls
Maximum proportion of the number of vans to the total number of vehicles
